This form allows you to add yourself to the Inhabitants section of Barbarian's Domain.  Before continuing, please read the following information about the use of this form and requirements.

You MUST include either an e-mail address to be published, an ICQ UIN number, or personal web page Title and URL.  This is a "contact" list, not a who's who.  While only one of those is required, you may supply as many of them as you wish.  Any entry added without at least one of these will be discarded without notification.
While you can add your own entry, it will NOT be available for public viewing until authenticated by the administrator of this site.  Please be patient and check back to see if your entry is visible.  If you submitted an entry and don't see it listed within a weeks time, please e-mail the Barbarian.
All web pages specified are viewed to ensure they are not of inappropriate content as deemed by this sites administrator.  Sites listed should keep a family atmosphere in mind, or at least close to it.  Web pages need not be EverQuest related, but should be appropriate for the majority of the audience of visitors who may view them.
If problems occur using this form, or if your browser doesn't support forms, please e-mail the Barbarian and ask for assistance.  Please note that the form is particular about how things are entered.  If your web page title has an apostrophe, include a second one along with it.  This is a common mistake that will result in an error when you attempt to add yourself.
Should you wish to include a picture, please provide the URL where the picture is located on your web space.  For free web space, refer to such places as GeoCities, Xoom, AngelFire, Tripod, or many others who offer them.  It is suggested that pictures not exceed 50K in size as it affects how long it takes a visitor to view your information.  Definitely do NOT link to a bitmap (BMP) file as those are EXTREMELY large.

Now, on to submitting your Inhabitant entry.   Be sure to use proper case for your characters name.  All text fields ARE case sensitive.

Character Name *
Server
Race
Class
Real Name
Country of origin
E-Mail Address *
ICQ UIN number *
Web page title *
Web page URL *
Picture URL

Entries with a * next to them are required.   While an e-mail address, ICQ UIN number, or web page is noted as required, only one is.  You can choose which one.  Entries without one of these will not be added.
